author: Special Correspondent
text:
A route march for national integration was taken out by about 1,000 Rastriya Swayam Sevak Sangh volunteers to the accompaniment of band music from the Corporation Bus Stand to the Senunthar School on Sunday.

The National Youth Day celebration at the culminating point marked the 1,000th birth anniversary of Swami Ramanujam, 153rd birth anniversary of Swami Vivekananda and 125th birth anniversary of Dr. Ambedkar.

There was police presence all through the route since the march was not permitted for the last five years. The march was taken out following a high court order.
title: March taken out for national integration
